name: Russell
tagline: ES6 script to create a scrollspy.
body: # Russell This is Russell, a light **ES6 javascript** module to create a scrollspy. > It was a cinch with my Wilderness Explorer GPS ![russell](https://i.imgflip.com/160r3l.gif) ## Usage Add the **russell.js** file to your index.(html|php). ``` ``` Add `data-scroll` on the link that is going to be spying on the scroll. ``` My link ... ``` When the page reach the matching section, the link will have the css class `current`. You can thus, customize it. ## Options ### Offset Add an offset to the element. The offset will define the distance (in pixel) between the top of the page and the element.
